ChatAsync(IKernel, CopilotChatPlanner, IOptions<WebSearchSettings>, Ask, OpenApiSkillsAuthHeaders)

Invokes the chat skill to get a response from the bot.

Declaration
[Authorize]
[Route("chat")]
[HttpPost]
[ProducesResponseType(200)]
[ProducesResponseType(400)]
[ProducesResponseType(404)]
public async Task<IActionResult> ChatAsync([FromServices] IKernel kernel, [FromServices] CopilotChatPlanner planner, [FromServices] IOptions<WebSearchSettings> webSearchOptions, [FromBody] Ask ask, [FromHeader] OpenApiSkillsAuthHeaders openApiSkillsAuthHeaders)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.SemanticKernel.IKernel kernel

Semantic kernel obtained through dependency injection.
CopilotChatPlanner planner

Planner to use to create function sequences.
Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions<WebSearchSettings> webSearchOptions
Ask ask

Prompt along with its parameters.
OpenApiSkillsAuthHeaders openApiSkillsAuthHeaders

Authentication headers to connect to OpenAPI Skills.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult>

Results containing the response from the model.
